entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 2:42 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 600 metres rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog becoming fog patches this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
